alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A line of showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of central Garfield and eastern Rio Blanco Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of heavy showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles east of Meeker to 12 miles north of Rifle to near Parachute. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Brief, torrential rain is also expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rifle around 550 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Battlement Mesa, Buford and Rio Blanco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
